meanings.definition: An expression of disgust or distaste.
meanings.sent3: Yucch, I accidentally put salt in my coffee!
meanings.sent4: The spoiled milk made me go 'yucch' as soon as I opened the carton.
meanings.sent5: The slimy texture of the okra made me exclaim 'yucch' in surprise.

meanings.sent1: The garbage can had a strong yucch smell.
meanings.sent2: I stepped on a yucch on the sidewalk.
meanings.sent3: The yucch in the fridge turned out to be a forgotten sandwich.
meanings.sent4: The horror movie was full of yucch scenes that made me cover my eyes.
meanings.sent5: The slimy yucch on the plate made my stomach turn.
